absolute left-4 top-1 -translate-x-1/2 w-3 h-3 rounded-full border-2 border-custom-blue bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-700 transition-colors duration-300

h3.class: font-medium text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300 mb-2 transition-colors duration-300

div.class: bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/30 p-3 rounded-lg transition-colors duration-300

p.class: font-bold text-sm text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100 mb-2 transition-colors duration-300

table.class: w-full text-left text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-200 transition-colors duration-300

tr.td: Patient has productive cough for 3 days, fever, runny nose.
